title: Developer Stories
body: I like to stay updated about the tech stacks. How I achieve that? READING, READING, READING...

stories.title: Little great things about Visual Studio 2019 | The Visual Studio Blog
stories.description: A few days ago, we announced the general availability of Visual Studio 2019. But I’ve been using Visual Studio 2019 exclusively since the first internal build – long before the release of Preview 1 in December of 2018. During this time,
